Package javelin.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ImageHandler
    Cache for Monster.avatar
    Images
    Index of in-memory image objects.
    MapPanel
    Panel descendant used to display a Map contains most of graphics redraw logic also some animation/explosion handling TODO this redraws the entire screen all the time (besides my background hack), this needs to be totally redesign into a modern UI like that from MegaMek.
    StatusPanel
    Bottom panel for the WorldScreen.
